mapper.select: SELECT h_uid, h_name, h_title, h_career, h_position1, h_position2, h_part, h_degree, h_workform, to_date(h_regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')-round(sysdate) h_remainDate FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, T.* FROM (SELECT * FROM Hire ORDER BY h_uid DESC) T) WHERE RNUM >= #{from} AND RNUM < (#{from} + #{pageRows}) and h_position1 like #{search} and (h_name like #{searchWord} or h_title like #{searchWord} or h_part like #{searchWord})
